headline: Mondelēz International’s Global R&D Team Opens Applications for CoLab Tech 2026
summary: Accelerator program helps advance emerging snack-centric technologiesFocus areas include climate resilience, breakthrough performance technologies, next-generation ingredients and more sustainable packagingCurriculum designed to help companies achieve commercial viability and scalability through virtual sessions, 1:1 mentorship and potential proof of concept testingApplications are now open at snackfutures.com/colab-tech; up to 10 start-ups will be selected CHICAGO, Jan. 22, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE
